description: Ground floor rear extension, and front porch.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | Notwithstanding the details shown on the drawings hereby approved, the existing garage shall not be demolished and shall be permanently retained and made available for parking purposes for the occupiers of the property.  REASON:  To ensure an adequate supply of off street car parking. | The forecourt parking space and associated landscaping shown on the drawings hereby approved, shall be constructed before the rear extension is first brought into use and shall be kept permanently available for private car parking.  REASON:  To ensure an adequate supply of off street car parking. | Notwithstanding the iinformation shown on the approved drawings, the raised patio area to the rear of the proposed extension shall not be constructed.  REASON:  To preserve privacy in the adjoining garden. | No window or door openings shall be created in the side wall of the extension hereby approved.  REASON:  To protect neighbours' privacy.
